title: Golden Growth Fund (GGF), a category-II alternative investment fund, to raise Rs 400 crore
description: Golden Growth Fund sought to raise Rs 400 crore for acquiring land in South Delhi to develop luxury apartments. The fund completed its first fundraising round and acquired a plot in Anand Niketan. Partnering with Grovy India, it aimed to develop and sell high-end residential floors, each valued up to Rs 30 crore.
